I'm procrastinating and bored, so I'll bite.  :-D
 
>>1) Name/Nickname/Scre=
en name whatever (+ anything you would like us to 
know about you)<<
 
Go b=
y philalexandros because of my longtime fascination with Alexander the Grea=
t (no, I have not seen the movie nor have any great need to), which quickly=
 became shortened to "phil" when I started getting into circles dealing wit=
h Japanese history.  For some reason, Greek was just too much for them to t=
ake in (while my mind still boggles at some Japanese names).
 
YIM keeps cr=
ashing my computer so I'm never on it (until I figure out the problem), but=
 the sn is the same as my email -- spiritus_saitou.  Usually on AIM, usuall=
y invisible, but you can give it a try --- sagara sozoko.
 
You don't want =
to know about me... trust me on this one.  :-D  I'm wacko.  And right now, =
completely overwhelmed with researching Sagara (and things associated with =
him, like Mito) and not specifically the Shinsengumi.  Once upon a time, I =
was a SaiSa fanfic writer... and I miss them very much.
 
>>2) How did you =
=93discover=94 the Shinsengumi?<<
 
Rurouni Kenshin.  It was those amber wo=
lf's eyes of Saitou and the way he kept messing with darling Sanosuke's min=
d.
 
>>3) Do you have a favorite Shinsengumi member? Why?<<
 
Saitou... how=
 do I love thee?  I'm not about to count the ways.  His portrayal in RK sim=
ply took me over and the fascination grew with each new portrayal I saw of =
him and the more I learned about the real person.  I admire his strength an=
d his ability to survive the emotional & physical turmoils he endured.
 
It=
ou Kashitarou is a recent fascination because of his politics and crossed p=
aths with Sagara Souzou (and the fact I love his RPG incarnation and Taniha=
ra from NHK is to die for).
 
Suzuki Mikisaburou because of his Sekihoutai =
connection and the fact he is very much ignored and maligned.
 
>>4) What S=
hinsengumi media have you read/seen?<<
 
Seen - RK, PMK, Sword of Doom, NHK=
 Shinsengumi! (but so far only the Itou arc, of course), some of Shinsengum=
i Kepporoku (spelling?  need to get back to that series), Gohatto, and Mibu=
 gishi den (without benefit of subtitles).  No doubt I'm forgetting somethi=
ng.
 
Read - really, only a scanlation of RK and some of PMK (whichever one=
 started being scanlated).  Have scanlations of several others and the nove=
l Sec provided access to that Sword of Doom was based on.  My reading has b=
een elsewhere, but they're there for me when I'm ready.  What I've read of =
the history of the Shinsengumi has come from an assortment of books referri=
ng to them or members, websites, and being on SHQ.
 
>>5) In terms of film/=
television portrayals what film (or series) do you 
think captured your fav=
orite member(s) the best and why?<<
 
I don't think anyone can really fully=
 capture Saitou.  I think, in terms of historical portrayal, NHK may come t=
he closest to the man I've read about.. aloof but dedicated, ruthless but f=
eeling.  My *favorite* remains RK, probably because that was how I was intr=
oduced to him and he's really such a cool character to have juxtaposed agai=
nst Kenshin and Sano.  I admire RK Saitou's loyalty to the cause of overcom=
ing evil regardless of any political faction.
 
It's going to be a long tim=
e before anyone comes close to outdoing NHK's Itou.
 
Poor Suzuki... like W=
HEN do I EVER get to see him?  If you can find him in NHK, I think the acto=
r is too young given Suzuki was only a couple years younger than his brothe=
r, Itou, but hey, beggars can't be choosers.

>>6) Do you have any question=
s that are nagging at you about any 
particular Shinsengumi members or even=
ts?<<
 
Unless someone discovers that Kojima Masamitsu (Sagara) was hiding =
out in the ranks of the Shinsengumi at some point, I'm afraid I'm working w=
ith blinders on right now.  :-D  I have LOTS of questions about Itou & Suzu=
ki, but I'm learning along with the rest of you.  (I'll try to get the Suzu=
ki info organized so we can get that up on the site... it's just rather dif=
ficult putting it all together...as usual.  I spent a whole day going throu=
gh contortions just to build what I have of his history up to the end of hi=
s time in the Shinsengumi for the RPG... his post-Shinsengumi history is sc=
attered everywhere.)
 
phil
